tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceStorage (
    threat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    threat_description TEXT,
    threat_source VARCHAR(100),
    threat_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligence (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ThreatName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ThreatType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    ThreatDescription TEXT,
    AnalyzedBy VARCHAR(50),
    AnalysisDate TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatReports (
    ReportID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ThreatID INT NOT NULL,
    ReportDate TIMESTAMP,
    ReportContent TEXT,
    ReportedBy VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (ThreatID) REFERENCES ThreatIntelligence(ID)
);

CREATE TABLE threat_actors (
  actor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  actor_type VARCHAR(50),
  actor_description TEXT,
  actor_country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE threat_sources (
  source_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  source_type VARCHAR(50),
  source_description TEXT,
  source_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligence (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    severity INT,
    reference_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT NOT NULL,
    incident_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatActors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    actor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    known_activities TEXT,
    affiliation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT NOT NULL,
    findings TEXT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatFeeds (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    feed_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    feed_url TEXT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP,
    active BOOLEAN
);
